meanings.definition: To make something common to all members of a group.
meanings.sent1: The teacher is communizing the toys so that every child can play with them.
meanings.sent2: The community is communizing the garden for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The ants are communizing the picnic leftovers, sharing them with their colony.
meanings.sent4: The sun communizes its light, spreading it equally across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The magic wand communizes happiness, granting it to all who need it.

meanings.definition: To establish a system of communal ownership and control.
meanings.sent1: The group is communizing the resources to ensure fair distribution.
meanings.sent2: The village is communizing the land for collective farming.
meanings.sent3: The siblings are communizing their toys, creating a shared play area.
meanings.sent4: The leader communizes power, making decisions for the benefit of all.
meanings.sent5: The company communizes profits, sharing them among all employees.
